query:
SELECT 
  pw.id AS wave_id,
  pw.waveNumber,
  pw.status AS wave_status,
  COUNT(DISTINCT po.id) AS total_orders,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN po.status = 'picked' THEN po.id END) AS picked_orders,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN po.status = 'pending' THEN po.id END) AS pending_orders,
  COUNT(pwi.id) AS total_items,
  SUM(CASE WHEN pwi.status = 'picked' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS picked_items,
  SUM(CASE WHEN pwi.status = 'pending' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS pending_items
FROM pickingWaves pw
LEFT JOIN pickingOrders po ON po.waveId = pw.id
LEFT JOIN pickingWaveItems pwi ON pwi.waveId = pw.id
WHERE pw.status IN ('pending', 'picking', 'completed')
GROUP BY pw.id
ORDER BY pw.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 5;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 44TTARZqZm4zxSK.6207e12656da --database YB8JBMXFWs4i38ecUvjPnS --execute SELECT 
  pw.id AS wave_id,
  pw.waveNumber,
  pw.status AS wave_status,
  COUNT(DISTINCT po.id) AS total_orders,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN po.status = 'picked' THEN po.id END) AS picked_orders,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN po.status = 'pending' THEN po.id END) AS pending_orders,
  COUNT(pwi.id) AS total_items,
  SUM(CASE WHEN pwi.status = 'picked' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS picked_items,
  SUM(CASE WHEN pwi.status = 'pending' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS pending_items
FROM pickingWaves pw
LEFT JOIN pickingOrders po ON po.waveId = pw.id
LEFT JOIN pickingWaveItems pwi ON pwi.waveId = pw.id
WHERE pw.status IN ('pending', 'picking', 'completed')
GROUP BY pw.id
ORDER BY pw.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 5;
